column4: hi, is there a howto anywhere for setting up a simple home network with dhcp? i need to connect a hacked xbox to my computer to transfer some files but it cant connect to my wireless router, so it needs to be connected to my pc directly.
there are probably dhcpd howto's on google somewhere, i'm sure.
apt-get install dhcp3-server, and look in /etc/dhcpd3  as a starting place
